item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, September 28, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:

8. Everything you need to know about Python 3.13 – JIT and GIL went up the hill (19 points | discuss)
9. It's hard to write code for computers, but it's harder to write code for humans (353 points | 110 comments)
10. Ocean waves grow way beyond known limits (17 points | 5 comments)

22. Charge Robotics (YC S21) is hiring MechEs to build robots that build solar farms ( | hide)
23. Greenwich: an experiment in collaborative links (147 points | 93 comments)
24. Show HN: Quadratic – native JavaScript support in a spreadsheet (78 points | 24 comments)

26. Tandem OLED is OLED's latest weapon in holding off MicroLED, QDEL (61 points | 40 comments)
27. AMD Unveils Its First Small Language Model AMD-135M (204 points | 59 comments)
28. LlamaF: An Efficient Llama2 Architecture Accelerator on Embedded FPGAs (82 points | 24 comments)
29. The CRPG Book Project (2023) (89 points | 23 comments)
